definitions.definition: a plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is built or made.
examples: he has just unveiled his design for the new museum

definitions.definition: the art or action of conceiving of and producing a plan or drawing.
examples: good design can help the reader understand complicated information

definitions.definition: an arrangement of lines or shapes created to form a pattern or decoration.
examples: pottery with a lovely blue and white design

definitions.definition: purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object.
examples: the appearance of design in the universe
synonyms: ambition "his design of reaching the top"

definitions.definition: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object), typically by making a detailed drawing of it.
examples: a number of architectural students were designing a factory
synonyms: draw More"the church was designed by Hicks"invent
fashion; informaldream up "they designed a new engine"

definitions.definition: do or plan (something) with a specific purpose or intention in mind.
examples: the tax changes were designed to stimulate economic growth
synonyms: destine "this paper is designed to provoke discussion"
